h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Boss Fight and Guide
content: It turns out that the spiked gold ball is hiding a secret inside, which is two minibosses for you to take on. They will both use a portion of the ball as a shield and have a sword to complement it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
It turns out that the spiked gold ball is hiding a secret inside, which is two minibosses for you to take on. They will both use a portion of the ball as a shield and have a sword to complement it.
